title: How to Delete Photos from Photostream

steps.headline: From the Home menu, click on Photos.
Click on the Photostream tab in the bottom middle.
In the top right hand corner, click on “Edit.”
Select the photos you want deleted by simply clicking on each one.
steps.description: When clicked, each photo should become slightly faded and have a check mark on the bottom right hand corner.

steps.headline: After you have selected your photos, click on the red “Delete” button on the bottom right hand corner.
Now your pictures are deleted off your phone/iPod, and consequently from your Photostream entirely!
steps.description: If you want to delete an entire album of pictures, go back to the “Albums” page and follow the same Edit->Select->Delete method.

steps.headline: From the Menu column on the left hand side, click on Photostream.
steps.description: This can generally be found under the “Recent” section. In it, you should find all the pictures stored on your Photostream.

steps.headline: Select the pictures you want removed, and then double click on any of the photo.
Click “Delete from Photo Stream".
steps.description: This will effectively delete these pictures from your Photostream entirely.

text: iPhone\/iPad\/iPod Touch From the Home menu, click on Photos.  Click on the Photostream tab in the bottom middle.  In the top right hand corner, click on “Edit.”  Select the photos you want deleted by simply clicking on each one. When clicked, each photo should become slightly faded and have a check mark on the bottom right hand corner. After you have selected your photos, click on the red “Delete” button on the bottom right hand corner.  Now your pictures are deleted off your phone/iPod, and consequently from your Photostream entirely! If you want to delete an entire album of pictures, go back to the “Albums” page and follow the same Edit->Select->Delete method. Mac Open iPhoto.  From the Menu column on the left hand side, click on Photostream. This can generally be found under the “Recent” section. In it, you should find all the pictures stored on your Photostream. Select the pictures you want removed, and then double click on any of the photo.  Click “Delete from Photo Stream". This will effectively delete these pictures from your Photostream entirely.
